description: The concept of organizational culture in terms of gender Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) refers to the collective values, beliefs, and behaviors that determine how a companyâ€™s employees interact and how management supports and promotes gender diversity. This includes policies, practices, and attitudes that influence the workplace environment and affect how gender issues are addressed.
